sentences.sContent: The steamer will go west by north.
sentences.sContent_eng: The steamer will go west by north.
sentences.sCn: 这艘轮船将向西偏北方向航行。

sentences.sContent: To welcome the steamer, a long line of honor guards marched all in step.
sentences.sContent_eng: To welcome the steamer, a long line of honor guards marched all in step.
sentences.sCn: 为了欢迎轮船的到来，一支仪仗队步调合拍的行进着。

sentences.sContent: Gerald was fickle, in a week he would be in love with some girl he met on the steamer .
sentences.sContent_eng: Gerald was fickle, in a week he would be in love with some girl he met on the steamer .
sentences.sCn: 杰拉尔德是三心二意；不出一星期他就会爱上他在轮船上遇见的某个姑娘。

remMethod.val: steam(蒸汽) ＋ er → 使用蒸汽做动力的船 → 汽船

words.tran: 蒸汽的；雾重的，潮湿的；充满蒸汽的
蒸汽压路机；压倒对方的手段
用压路机把…压平；以势压倒
